summary: The module defines test models and custom QuerySet subclasses, then runs a suite of unit tests that validate Django ORM behavior—particularly the "in" lookup—and verify that various ORM objects (models, querysets, managers, annotations) can be correctly pickled and unpickled across multiple Django versions, handling missing version metadata where needed.
business_intent: Ensure reliable serialization of Django ORM components and correct query functionality, supporting compatibility testing across different Django releases.
